thread.title: EU referendum: Three of UK's biggest donors to bankroll 'out' campaign
thread.title_full: EU referendum: Three of UK's biggest donors to bankroll 'out' campaign - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: EU referendum: Three of UK's biggest donors to bankroll 'out' campaign
text: Three of the biggest political donors in Britain are to bankroll the campaign to pull the country out of the European Union, it will be announced. Peter Cruddas, who has given the Tories over £1.2 million will join Labour’s largest individual donor John Mills and Stuart Wheeler who bankrolled Ukip as joint treasurers of the cross party ‘leave’ campaign. Together the three have a net wealth of over £1 billion and have donated around £3 million to political causes. The campaign is also being backed by the mobile phone billionaire John Caudwell who founded Phones 4u and who helped bankroll the ‘No to AV’ campaign.
